ygData.subject: Re: Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
ygData.msgSnippet: It s a DoT effect.  20 points on the initial proc, and 20 points for two ticks after, for 60 extra damage, total. ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
ygData.messageBody:
It's a DoT effect. 20 points on the initial proc, and 20 points for two
ticks after, for 60 extra damage, total.


----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 12:20 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Stilleto of the Bloodclaw


>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>i believe it is a life tap, takes health from what you are attacking and
>gives it to you. not sure how many hp it takes.
>
>Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
